card1.title: Years of experience
card1.description: At ATM JET, we have been providing private flight services since 2004, offering a range of solutions, including special, cargo, and medical flights.

card2.title: Satisfied clients
card2.description: We are proud to serve over 16,000 customers who have chosen us as a reliable partner for their business aviation needs.

card3.title: Trusted by celebrities
card3.description: We are privileged to work with a diverse range of clients, including celebrities, business leaders, football clubs, public corporations, and government members. We are proud to be trusted with their comfort.

card4.title: Same-day departures
card4.description: We have 24/7 access to the largest aircraft database of over 25,000 aircraft, enabling our customers to fly within 5 hours of booking.

card5.title: Commitment to Excellence
card5.description: We take great care to treat every detail with the utmost attention, and our expertise allows us to exceed your expectations.

key-features.title: Exclusive key features
key-features.description: Unlock exceptional benefits with our exclusive key features designed to enhance your travel experience:

card1.title: Pay any way you want, including crypto
card1.description: We accept a wide variety of payment methods: From all individual and corporate bank accounts, including cryptocurrency, making booking with us easy and convenient.

card2.title: ATM JET CRM
card2.description: With our ATM Jet CRM, all you have to do is tell us your preferences once and we'll make sure everything is prepared just the way you like it every time you board.

card3.title: Customized aircraft and crew
card3.description: We are pleased to offer our loyal customers flexible post-flight payment systems.We select the most appropriate aircraft and crew for each airport, in order to guarantee the highest standards of comfort for our clients

card4.title: Payment after the flight
card4.description: We select the most appropriate aircraft and crew for each airport, in order to guarantee the highest standards of comfort for our clients.

card1.title: Fly at cost
card1.description: Eliminate the standard brokerage commission, which averages 3-9%, and fly for the cost of hiring an aircraft. Lowest prices

card2.title: Payment and transfer assistance.
card2.description: We have a variety of multi-currency accounts in different countries, including cryptocurrency accounts and clients who pay in different ways. We offer transit and exchange assistance to our members.

card3.title: VIP Flight Management
card3.description: The founder of ATM Jet personally manages your VIP flights from start to finish, saving you time and resources.

contact.title: Contact Key Account Manager
contact.description: Leave your contact details and we will get in touch to tell you all the benefits of ATM Privelege

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.question1: How do I order a plane and what documents are needed for this?
faq.answer1: Fill out the booking form and then the personal manager will call you to negotiate the cost of the flight. The package of documents corresponds to the standard one for air travel, the only supplement will be a contract for the provision of a private flight. We will send you a commercial offer with available aircraft on the chosen route. Next, you choose the option that takes into account all your wishes and we sign the lease of the aircraft. Payment is made in the way that suits you: bank transfer, cash, credit card.
faq.question2: How much does it cost to rent a plane, the price?
faq.answer2: The cost of a private jet is calculated taking into account such factors as:‍- Class, type of aircraft- Jet basing- Preferable route- Features of the airports hosting the flight- Other individual wishes of the client, etc.
faq.question3: Can I change the conditions of the booked flight?
faq.answer3: YES, AND YOU CAN RELY ON:‍- Individual approach- Provision of an airplane of any class- Worthy service on board- Operational route adjustment and making changes according to your wishes, full confidentiality. One of the main tasks of business aviation is to provide high-quality services and provide several related services. We focus exclusively on customer requests. The ATM JET business aviation center is ready to fulfill a whole range of tasks to create optimal conditions for the flight.
faq.question4: How safe are individual private flights?
faq.answer4: A private plane and its lease should have personal security and confidentiality. ATM JET fully guarantees their compliance. Information about the flight is available only to the client and a limited circle of our employees who are responsible for not disclosing the data known to them. In addition, renting an airplane excludes the possibility of the presence on board of undesirable people for you. Your "neighbors" during the flight will be only passengers invited by you, flight attendants, and the crew of the aircraft. This is especially essential for representatives of show business and dignitaries. For transportation of passengers within the limits of rent of a private airplane our company uses modern and reliable transport. Absolutely all air assets are undergoing technical and service maintenance in a timely manner.
faq.question5: What are the rules for transporting pets on private planes?
faq.answer5: Please let us know when placing an order and our company will prepare everything you need beforehand. Also for the transportation of pets in a private airplane, a veterinary certificate of Form No. 1 is required.
